name: JLGJ
description:
This is an elimination game that can bring joy to the players. It has an interesting design of playing methods, so that every player who likes to eliminate the game can experience a wonderful breakthrough, and enter the next level through constant challenges in this small leisure game.

Game features:

1. Bring players the most magical challenge of "three elimination", and constantly strive to challenge higher levels;

2. All kinds of pictures are also very interesting and interesting, and the difficulty can change constantly.

Introduction to the game:

1. The elimination of games with high difficulty brings different synthetic experiences. It requires flexible operation to successfully pass the customs;

2. In the process of elimination, it is necessary to observe the pattern of the lower layer of the square. Targeted selection and click can quickly clear the customs!

Game experience:

To eliminate three of the same patterns, you need to eliminate all the patterns.
